item.title: [GRA1/GRA3][Web Hosting] - CloudDB migrations
item.description:
Aug 11, 20:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 11, 20:36 UTC
Update - UPDATE: Most of the cluster had been migrated successfully. We're stopping the migrations for this week-end and will continue on Tuesday, until Wednesday.

Aug 9, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 8, 19:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/08/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 12/08/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : During this operation, our customers may experience an unavailability of 1 minute
Service improvement : Within the framework of the continuous improvement of our services, we carry out an operation of migration of the DBMS instances from GRA1 to GRA3. The concerned clusters by this maintenance are: sql008 (GRA1). Containers will migrate to eu010 (GRA3).
Please note that the current maintenance can take place 24/24.
